questions.question: Which of the following sentences uses the subjunctive mood correctly?
options: If I was you, I would study harder.
If I were you, I would study harder.
If I am you, I would study harder.
If I will be you, I would study harder.
questions.answer: If I were you, I would study harder.

questions.question: Identify the sentence that uses a reduced relative clause correctly.
options: The man who is standing by the door is my brother.
The man standing by the door is my brother.
The man by the door he is my brother.
The man stands by the door is my brother.
questions.answer: The man standing by the door is my brother.

questions.question: What is the meaning of the word 'ephemeral'?
options: lasting for a very short time
questions.answer: lasting for a very short time
